Name: nitrile-compound production | nitrile-compound | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2021:Manufacture of pesticides and other agrochemical products
Description: This dataset was calculated from the arithmetic mean of all inputs and outputs of the production of bromoxynil, chlorothalonil, dichlobenil, and ioxynil.;Bromoxynil is produced in four steps from phenol:;C6H6O + CHCl3 + KOH → C7H6O2 + 2 HCl + KCl;C7H6O2 + 2 Br2 → C7H4Br2O2 + HBr;C7H4Br2O2 + NH3O → C7H5Br2NO2 + H2O;C7H5Br2NO2 → C7H2Br2NO + H2O;Precursors that are used for the bromoxynil production are hydroxylamine ((NH3OH)2SO4) and nitrous dioxide (NO2).;Chlorothalonil is produced in three steps from xylene: ;2 C8H10 + 2 NH3 + 3 O2 → 2 C8H7N + 6 H2O;2 C8H7N + 2 NH3 + 3 O2 → 2 C8H4N2 + 6 H2O;C8H4N2 + 4 Cl2 → C8Cl4N2 + 4 HCl;Dichlobenil is produced in four steps from o-dichlorobenzene:;C7H8 + 4 Cl2 → C7H4Cl4 + 4 HCl;C7H4Cl3 + H2O → C7H4Cl2O + 2 HCl;C7H4Cl2O + NH3O → C7H5Cl2NO + H2O;C7H5Cl2NO → C7H3Cl2N + H2O;Precursors that are used for the dichlobenil production are hydroxylamine (NH3O) and nitrous dioxide (NO2).;Ioxynil is produced in four steps from phenol:;C6H6O + CHCl3 + KOH → C7H6O2 + 2 HCl + KCl;C7H6O2 + 2 I2 → C7H4I2O2 + HI;C7H4I2O2 + NH3O → C7H5I2NO2 + H2O;C7H5I2NO2 → C7H2I2NO + H2O;Precursors that are used for the ioxynil production are hydroxylamine (NH3O) and nitrous dioxide (NO2).;Precursors: ;Hydroxylamine (NH3O) is produced in five steps from ammonia:;4 NH3 + 5 O2 → 4 NO + 6 H2O;NO2 + NO + (NH4)2CO3 → 2 N2H4O2 + CO2;N2H4O2 + 2 SO2 + NH3 + H2O → H9N3O7S2;2 H9N3O7S2 + 2 NH3 + 4 H2O → (NH3OH)2SO4 + 3 (NH4)2SO4;(NH3OH)2SO4 + 2 NaOH → 2 NH3O + Na2SO4 + 2 H2O;Nitrous dioxide (NO2) is produced by oxidation of nitrogen:;2 NO + O2 → 2 NO2
